mapper.select: SELECT '경남서비스센터' AS COL1 , '부산지점' AS COL2 , '김교원' AS COL3 , '1234567' AS COL4 , '직무사원(1급)' AS COL5 , '엔지니어' AS COL6 , 12 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 , 0 AS COL9 , 12 AS COL10 , 123450 AS COL11 , 0 AS COL12 , 12 AS COL13 , 123450 AS COL14 , 0 AS COL15 , 12 AS COL16 , 123450 AS COL17 , 0 AS COL18 , 123 AS COL19 , 1234500 AS COL20 , 0 AS COL21 , 123 AS COL22 , 1234500 AS COL23 , 12 AS COL24 , 123450 AS COL25 , 12 AS COL26 , 123450 AS COL27 , 12 AS COL28 , 123450 AS COL29 , 12 AS COL30 , 123450 AS COL31 , 12 AS COL32 , 123450 AS COL33 , 12 AS COL34 , 123450 AS COL35 , 1234500 AS COL36 , 1234500 AS COL37 , 123450 AS COL38 , 123450 AS COL39 , 123450 AS COL40 , 123450 AS COL41 , 12 AS COL42 , 123450 AS COL43 , 12 AS COL44 , 123450 AS COL45 , 12 AS COL46 , 123450 AS COL47 , 12 AS COL48 , 123450 AS COL49 , 123450 AS COL50 , 123450 AS COL51 , 123450 AS COL52 , 1234500 AS COL53 , '2022-10-20' AS COL54 , '-' AS COL55 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '서부서비스센터' AS COL1 , '서부지점' AS COL2 , '박교원' AS COL3 , '1234500' AS COL4 , '직무사원(1급)' AS COL5 , '엔지니어' AS COL6 , 12 AS COL7 , 123450 AS COL8 , 0 AS COL9 , 12 AS COL10 , 123450 AS COL11 , 0 AS COL12 , 12 AS COL13 , 123450 AS COL14 , 0 AS COL15 , 12 AS COL16 , 123450 AS COL17 , 0 AS COL18 , 123 AS COL19 , 1234500 AS COL20 , 0 AS COL21 , 123 AS COL22 , 1234500 AS COL23 , 12 AS COL24 , 123450 AS COL25 , 12 AS COL26 , 123450 AS COL27 , 12 AS COL28 , 123450 AS COL29 , 12 AS COL30 , 123450 AS COL31 , 12 AS COL32 , 123450 AS COL33 , 12 AS COL34 , 123450 AS COL35 , 1234500 AS COL36 , 1234500 AS COL37 , 123450 AS COL38 , 123450 AS COL39 , 123450 AS COL40 , 123450 AS COL41 , 12 AS COL42 , 123450 AS COL43 , 12 AS COL44 , 123450 AS COL45 , 12 AS COL46 , 123450 AS COL47 , 12 AS COL48 , 123450 AS COL49 , 123450 AS COL50 , 123450 AS COL51 , 123450 AS COL52 , 1234500 AS COL53 , '2022-10-20' AS COL54 , '-' AS COL55 FROM DUAL

SELECT '경남서비스센터' AS COL1 , '12345' AS COL2 , '김교원' AS COL3 , '센터장' AS COL4 , '정규직' AS COL5 , 1234500 AS COL6 , 123450 AS COL7 , 1234500 AS COL8 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '경남서비스센터' AS COL1 , '12345' AS COL2 , '김교원' AS COL3 , '센터장' AS COL4 , '정규직' AS COL5 , 1234500 AS COL6 , 123450 AS COL7 , 1234500 AS COL8 FROM DUAL
